review: We like this much better than our old Roku, user interface is amazing. Cannot say enough good things. Just have to order a few more for the other tvs.
author: JB

review: Unable to use with my network my wideband is not strong enough.

review: I like the fire stick.  Am having difficulty finding movies, etc.  That I like but will keep trying.
author: Deacon Linda

review: Love my fire stick, it is so easy to plug in and start watching so much, and a lot cheaper than having to buy other equipment
author: Theresa

review: Easy to install--great value for the money
author: Deborah Shook

review: Very slow, video games a robotic noise and I have to restart the whole device every few half hour.  Would not recommend.
author: Ryan J. Kline "Drune"

review: It was just a little bit tricky to set up but I got it done and love using it!
author: Jennifer Neeley
